title: Capstone Programmer
description: As a capstone programmer, I spearheaded the development of innovative software solutions, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to address complex challenges. Collaborating closely with stakeholders, I conceptualized, designed, and implemented robust applications, demonstrating proficiency in coding, problem-solving, and project management.

title: Information Techonology Intern
location: PPA PMO NCR North, Manila City
description: During my IT internship, I focused on providing technical support and developing local systems for the Philippine Ports Authority. This involved troubleshooting technical issues and contributing to the creation of tailored systems to enhance operational efficiency.

title: IT Desktop Support Engineer
description: As an IT Desktop Support Engineer, I provide comprehensive technical assistance, resolving hardware and software issues to ensure seamless operations within the organization. Leveraging my expertise, I maintain and optimize desktop infrastructure, delivering efficient IT solutions tailored to the needs of users and promoting productivity across all levels of the company.
